languages.text: "Нет. Но это орудие несет смерть во имя Его — значит, мы говорим на одном языке".
"I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so, we speak the same tongue."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Но это орудие несет смерть во имя Его — значит, мы говорим на одном языке".

traits.locale_text: "I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so we speak in the same tongue."
"I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so we speak in the same tongue."
"I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so, we speak in the same tongue."
"I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so, we speak in the same tongue."
"I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so, we speak the same tongue."
"I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so, we speak the same tongue."

languages.text: «No, pero esta arma se ha creado para extender la muerte en Su nombre, por lo que debemos entendernos».
languages.original_text: "I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so, we speak the same tongue."

traits.locale_text: «No, pero esta arma se ha creado para extender la muerte en Su nombre, por lo que debemos entendernos».

languages.text: “我从来没试过，但这件武器是以神皇的名义，出于侍奉死亡的目的而建造的，因此我们有很多共同之处。”
languages.original_text: "I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so, we speak the same tongue."

traits.locale_text: “我从来没试过，但这件武器是以神皇的名义，出于侍奉死亡的目的而建造的，因此我们有很多共同之处。”

languages.text: 「ありませんわ。しかし、この武器は彼の名において死を与えるために作られておりますので、私たちの意志は同じです」
languages.original_text: "I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so, we speak the same tongue."

traits.locale_text: 「ありませんわ。しかし、この武器は彼の名において死を与えるために作られておりますので、私たちの意志は同じです」

languages.text: « L'occasion ne s'est encore jamais présentée, mais cette arme a été conçue pour semer la mort en Son nom, aussi parlons-nous le même langage, elle et moi. »
languages.original_text: "I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so, we speak the same tongue."

traits.locale_text: « L'occasion ne s'est encore jamais présentée, mais cette arme a été conçue pour semer la mort en Son nom, aussi parlons-nous le même langage, elle et moi. »

languages.text: "Hayır. Fakat bu silah, O'nun adına ölüm bahşetmek için yapıldığından dilinden anlayacağımı söyleyebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so, we speak the same tongue."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. Fakat bu silah, O'nun adına ölüm bahşetmek için yapıldığından dilinden anlayacağımı söyleyebiliriz."

languages.text: "Nein. Aber diese Waffe wurde geschaffen, um in Seinem Namen zu töten, also sprechen wir dieselbe Sprache."
languages.original_text: "I have not. But this weapon was made to bestow death in His name, and so, we speak the same tongue."

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Aber diese Waffe wurde geschaffen, um in Seinem Namen zu töten, also sprechen wir dieselbe Sprache."
